THAILAND PROJECTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.89″ text_font=”Poppins||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”100ms”]

In year 2017, we have obtained the Agency License     ( License No.112/2017) for supplying workers to Thailand. We have sent more than 2000 workers since then.   

We are offering zero-fee recruitment services for Thailand, which is based on “employer pays principle” , and we ensure that workers pay “zero” recruitment cost.
